e20-4YP-Neuromorphic-Smart-Sensor-for-Au.title: Neuromorphic Smart Sensor for Autonomous Underwater Vehicles
e20-4YP-Neuromorphic-Smart-Sensor-for-Au.description: This paper proposes an integrated system that combines neuromorphic smart sensors, spiking neural networks (SNNs) on embedded GPU platforms (NVIDIA Jetson), and CORS/RTK-based surface buoy positioning to address important challenges in autonomous underwater vehicle (AUV) operations.

e20-4yp-A-Hierarchical-Hybrid-Framework-.title: A Hierarchical Hybrid Framework for Intrusion Detection in Network and Application Layers
e20-4yp-A-Hierarchical-Hybrid-Framework-.description: This a repository for the 4YP project on A Hierarchical Hybrid Framework for Intrusion  Detection in Network and Application Layers which is ML-based IDS

e20-4yp-AI-Enabled-Digital-Twin-for-Crac.title: AI Enabled Digital Twin for Crack Evolution in Concrete Beams
e20-4yp-AI-Enabled-Digital-Twin-for-Crac.description: This research presents a Digital Twin framework overcoming SHM limitations. We developed a surrogate deep learning model trained on FEA simulations with Concrete Damaged Plasticity parameters. It captures complex behaviors like cracking and yielding, revealing internal degradation missed by sensors.

e20-4yp-AI-legal-chain-resolver-II.title: AI legal chain resolver II
e20-4yp-AI-legal-chain-resolver-II.description: This project is an AI based legal reasoning system specifically designed for Sri Lankan law in the Sinhala language. It integrates Sinhala focused Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), a Knowledge Graph , and a Multi Agent System to process laws, court judgments, and legal documents written in Sinhala.

e20-4yp-Context-Aware-Ai-Sybil-Mitigatio.title: Context Aware Ai Sybil Mitigation WBAN IOMT
e20-4yp-Context-Aware-Ai-Sybil-Mitigatio.description: Context-aware, AI-driven self-healing framework for detecting and mitigating Sybil attacks in WBAN-based IoMT networks.

e20-4yp-Explainable-AI-Driven-Zero-Trust.title: Explainable AI Driven Zero Trust Anomaly Detection for Encrypted Traffic
e20-4yp-Explainable-AI-Driven-Zero-Trust.description: The aim of this project is to develop an AI-driven anomaly detection system for encrypted traffic in Zero Trust Architecture (ZTA) with explainable AI (XAI) for transparency.

e20-4yp-Federated-Agentic-Defense-For-Ze.title: Federated Agentic Defense For Zero Day Attacks
e20-4yp-Federated-Agentic-Defense-For-Ze.description: Implementation of a Federated Agentic Framework for real-time, privacy-preserving mitigation of zero-day cyberattacks using distributed intelligence

e20-4yp-Generative-Digital-Twin-Framewor.title: Generative Digital Twin Framework for Airport Surveillance Networks
e20-4yp-Generative-Digital-Twin-Framewor.description: A Generative Digital Twin framework leveraging Large Language Models to enable intent-driven video analytics and autonomous monitoring within airport terminal network environments.

e20-4yp-Lightweight-Deep-Learning-Models.title: Lightweight Deep Learning Models for Detection of Neurological Disorders Using EEG Signals
e20-4yp-Lightweight-Deep-Learning-Models.description: Development of a lightweight deep learning framework for EEG-based detection of neurological disorders, optimized for edge deployment, focusing on Alzheimer’s disease, Parkinson’s disease, and epilepsy using efficient model architectures and real-time inference constraints.

e20-4yp-Optimizing-Communication-Efficie.title: Optimizing Communication Efficiency and Latency in Blockchain Enabled FL Systems
e20-4yp-Optimizing-Communication-Efficie.description: A blockchain-enabled federated learning framework that enhances the original LiteChain architecture by minimizing communication overhead and reducing end-to-end latency.

e20-4yp-Predictive-Link-Stablitiy-and-Tr.title: Predictive Link Stablitiy and Trust Aware Routing in FANETs
e20-4yp-Predictive-Link-Stablitiy-and-Tr.description: This is a final year research on Improving Link Stability of Flying Ad-hoc Networks

e20-4yp-Reducing-context-switching-laten.title: Reducing context switching latency in RTES
e20-4yp-Reducing-context-switching-laten.description: FYP - Reducing context switching latency in RTES

e20-4yp-SinhSafe.title: SinhSafe
e20-4yp-SinhSafe.description: SinhSafe benchmarks XLM-R, SinBERT, and SinhLlama to identify the best model for Sinhala/Singlish cyberbullying detection. Our core contribution is a large pseudo-labeled dataset with fine-grained labels (Normal, Offensive, Bullying), processed via a hybrid transliteration pipeline to advance low-resource NLP safety tools.

e20-4yp-Synthetic-Cardiac-MRI-Image-Gene.title: Synthetic Cardiac MRI Image Generation using Deep Generative Models
e20-4yp-Synthetic-Cardiac-MRI-Image-Gene.description: Synthetic Cardiac MRI Image Generation using Deep Generative Models

e20-4yp-backdoor-resilient-federated-nid.title: backdoor resilient federated nids
e20-4yp-backdoor-resilient-federated-nid.description: Backdoor-Resilient Federated Learning for Network Intrusion Detection Systems

e20-4yp-eHealth-Application-to-Detect-IH.title: eHealth Application to Detect IHD Using ECG
e20-4yp-eHealth-Application-to-Detect-IH.description: eHealth Application to detect Ischemic Heart Diseases using ECGs

e20-4yp-metagenomics.title: metagenomics
e20-4yp-metagenomics.description: Comparative evaluation of 8 DR methods (PCA, PCoA, MDS, t-SNE, UMAP, PaCMAP, PHATE, SONG) and graph neural network clustering across human, soil, and marine metagenomic datasets. Addresses key challenges: 90-99% sparsity, compositionality, phylogenetic structure preservation.

e20-4yp-voice-enabled-llm-agentic-constr.title: voice enabled llm agentic construction scheduler
e20-4yp-voice-enabled-llm-agentic-constr.description: An LLM-based system that allows users to describe a construction project using voice input and automatically generates a construction schedule.

e20-4yp-wifi-7-backoff-security-testing-.title: wifi 7 backoff security testing and threat prediction
e20-4yp-wifi-7-backoff-security-testing-.description: wifi 7 security testing and threat prediction using digital twins
